attributes.action: Ban the playing of National Anthems and the flying of National Flags
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the RED ARROWS are to be barred from the 2012 Olympics for being to British, then it is perverse to allow the playing of National Anthems and/or the flying of National flags, as these are both profound symbols of Nationalism which should be deemed unacceptable for the same reasons

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
